Vnvd.StringHelper

Vnvd.StringHelper Class Reference

This static class involves helper methods that use strings. Most methods in this class are adapted from the blog: http://dotneteers.net/blogs/divedeeper/archive/2008/08/03/ParsingCSharpStrings.aspx which explains in depth how to parse C# string literals. More...

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static char CharFromCSharpLiteral (string source)
 Converts a C# literal string into a normal character..
static string StringFromCSharpLiteral (string source)
 Converts a C# literal string into a normal string.
static string StringFromVerbatimLiteral (string source)
 Converts a C# verbatim literal string into a normal string.

Detailed Description

This static class involves helper methods that use strings. Most methods in this class are adapted from the blog: http://dotneteers.net/blogs/divedeeper/archive/2008/08/03/ParsingCSharpStrings.aspx which explains in depth how to parse C# string literals.
